Package variants

Class DoubleBonus

java.lang.Object
variants.HandEvaluator
variants.DoubleBonus
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariant
public class DoubleBonus extends HandEvaluator implements GameVariant
This class implements a game variant of poker called Double Bonus providing informations like statistics and value of certain Hands when called
Author:
Eduardo Barata 99930, Andr√© Roque 86694
